name: Organizm Football
description:
During the golden age of genetic engineering, life can be molded to whatever our minds can imagine. Laboratories specializing in the ultimate combat lifeforms or biomechs have given birth to proving ground arenas. These combat arenas are built specifically to advance the potential of each biomech and also entertain the masses who link into their network. Link into one of our combat arenas today!

Organizm Football is a PvP, physics based, action/strategy game inspired by the board game found aboard the Millennium Falcon. Its easy to learn and provides a depth only a multiplayer game can provide.

This game is still in development and any feedback is truly welcomed. If there is something you feel should be changed or added to make the game better, please let us know. As an early build, we are open in taking the development of the game in any direction.

Currently the game features four modes and 12 achievements:

  • PvP online - Play against an online opponent
  • PvP offline - Play against an opponent on one device
  • Practice - Master the power button
  • Tutorial - Learn the basics
  • Go here for list of achievements

Future additions:

  • friends list
  • chat
  • skill levels
  • leader boards
